fn.p: Edited by: Arturo Anadón, Complutense University of Madrid, Spain
Reviewed by: Ayhan Filazi, Ankara University, Turkey; Berta São Braz, Faculdade de Medicina Veterinária da Universidade de Lisboa, Portugal
This article was submitted to Veterinary Pharmacology and Toxicology, a section of the journal Frontiers in Veterinary Science
